data_description.temperature_offset: Manual temperature calibration offset. Changes take effect within 30 seconds. Range: -20 to +20°C.
data_description.pin: 4-digit PIN for heater authentication. Factory default is 1234. Changes require integration reload.
data_description.preset_away_temp: Temperature for Away preset (anti-freeze protection). Default: 8°C.
data_description.preset_comfort_temp: Temperature for Comfort preset (normal heating). Default: 21°C.
data_description.external_temp_sensor: Select an external temperature sensor to automatically calibrate the heater's internal sensor. Leave empty to disable auto calibration.
data_description.auto_offset_max: Maximum automatic offset in °C. Limits how much the temperature can be adjusted based on external sensor. Default: 5°C.
